resources.string: H O M E\nM A R T
HomeMART has contributed greatly to growth, so has its staff having dedicated and professional team, focused on meeting the needs of client/ architect and educating them of what spaces can become.

For more than two decades, HomeMART has been successfully providing the industry, a full range of interior solutions and fit-out services. We stress on detailed initial project planning, close co-ordination, project management expertise to ensure accurate and efficiently executed projects and quality products.

Exclusions - Electrical & Electronic appliances, Wall Art, Natural / Artificial plants and any other product(s) not aforementioned.All types of civil works. Bathroom accessories. Mattress.

 1. Estimates are approximate and may vary according to final design of your home.

 2. Estimates do not include Bathroom Interiors, Flooring and Plumbing Costs.

 3. Estimate Do Not Include Electrical & Electronic appliances (AC, TV, FRIDGE, OWEN ETC), Wall Art, Natural / Artificial plants and any other product(s) not aforementioned.

 4. Estimate Do Not Include 3D concept design fees. For any further questions, please email Contact Us.
